name: Fireball (Jam Version)
description:
NOTE: For the mac version, move the app file into your applications!

Fireball: Like volleyball with FIRE! 

SLAM the ball into your opponent's health bars! The first two are armor, and the final one scores you a POINT! Score a predetermined number of points to win! Watch out for the fireballs SHOCKWAVES! They'll stun you for a second!

NOTE: 

The weirdest thing about the controls is that the angle you hit the ball at is determined by whether you're pressing RIGHT, LEFT, or NEITHER RIGHT NOR LEFT when you touch it.

Made by Joe Hanna in seven days for the Flyover Indies Learning Jam 1: A Ball and Paddle Game. Check out the flyover indies on twitter @flyoverindies or me @JoeHasDiedGames!

Controls: (works with some controllers... like... the PS3 controller and maybe others.)

Left Player:

A: Move left/hit high

D: Move Right/spike

W: Jump

S: Dive/Duck

Right Player:

LEFT ARROW: Move left/spike

RIGHT ARROW: Move Right/hit high

UP ARROW: Jump

DOWN ARROW: Dive/Duck

NOTE: Hitting the ball without pressing left or right rill result in a straight shot.
